articles.title: Who Was Daniel Ellsberg, The "Most Dangerous Man In America" - NDTV
articles.description: Daniel Ellsberg, the whistleblower who leaked the "Pentagon Papers'' about the Vietnam War and changed the public perceptions of the conflict, died at the age of 92, his family said.
articles.content: <li>Mr Ellsberg was born in Chicago on April 7, 1931 and was raised in the Michigan suburbs. He was a Marine Corps veteran with a Harvard doctorate. He had also worked for the Defense and State depar… [+825 chars]

articles.title: Daniel Ellsberg: Pentagon Papers whistleblower dies aged 92 - BBC
articles.description: His 1971 leak exposed lies about the Vietnam War and saw him dubbed "the most dangerous man in America".
articles.content:
